Name: Cool Cat Carson
Description: Cool Cat Carson is the embodiment of feline finesse within the WebtrES club. Sporting sleek shades and a cat-themed exterior, Carson is known for navigating the digital alleyways with the grace of a panther and the curiosity of a kitten. As the unofficial DJ of the group, Carson spins virtual records at online gatherings, setting the rhythm for coding marathons and hackathons. With paws always on the pulse of the latest tech trends, Carson's handDown pose is iconic, symbolizing a laid-back attitude amidst the ever-evolving world of technology.
